idea-plugin.name: Parquet Viewer
idea-plugin.description:
Parquet Viewer is a lightweight and efficient IntelliJ IDEA plugin that allows you to open and explore .parquet files directly within the IDE â€” no external tools required.

Features:
  • View Parquet schema in a tree format
  • Display data in a table with pagination and column filtering
  • Select specific columns to display
  • Auto-adjust column widths for better readability
  • Export current page or full data to CSV
  • Open multiple files with tabbed browsing
Use Cases:
  • Inspect Parquet files in big data, Spark, or Hadoop projects
  • Debug ETL pipelines and data flows within IntelliJ
  • Compare Parquet file contents without leaving your IDE
License:

Apache 2.0
